profile.name: Magallan Alekseeva
profile.title: Python Backend Developer & DevOps Engineer
profile.tagline: Designing microservice architectures and building scalable systems
profile.about: Backend developer and DevOps engineer with experience in designing microservice architectures. I quickly grasp new technologies, pay attention to code quality, and am ready for challenging tasks. In my free time, I explore new technologies and develop my own projects.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: Development of microservices for a Telegram bot platform based on Python/FastAPI with Pydantic for data validation; design and implementation of REST API with external system integration (requests/httpx).
achievements: Designed and implemented a complete microservice architecture for the platform using Kafka for asynchronous interaction between services
Developed a CRM system on FastAPI with Pydantic for strict typing and data validation, enabling centralized management of bot creation, editing, and configuration; improved team workflow efficiency
Optimized system performance: implemented asynchronous request processing (asyncio), optimized SQL queries and PostgreSQL schemas
Set up DevOps processes: automated deployment through Docker and GitLab CI/CD, configured Nginx for secure communication
Mentored and managed a small development team: coordinated tasks, conducted code reviews in GitLab, refactored code, monitored deadlines, and managed releases
Documented architecture and decisions in the project's local MediaWiki

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: A.N. Kosygin Russian State University (Technologies. Design. Art), Moscow
education.description: Institute of Information Technologies and Digital Transformation, 3rd year (distance learning)

projects.name: Telegram Bot Platform
projects.description: Microservice platform for creating and managing Telegram bots with CRM functionality and asynchronous message processing

projects.name: Personal Website & Server Infrastructure
projects.description: Self-hosted website with multiple services, SSL configuration, and reverse proxy setup
